name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of March 30, an accident occurred on Shenzhen Metro Line 14. Some netizens said on Weibo that many people ran to one end of the train when the train was about to arrive at Dayun Station.
Another video showed two subway workers dragging a screen to the scene, and then the video was deleted.
The video was captioned "The train was moving and people were chasing in the carriage. I woke up in shock. Run for my life"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was caused by a man who suddenly went crazy and collapsed in the carriage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of March 30, Jieyang, Guangdong.
Traffic police arrested people riding electric bikes without helmets
According to the contributor, the traffic police used the same arrest method to make two cyclists fall in the middle of the road the night before.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 30, a fire broke out in Mile, Yunnan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, NetEase's drastic changes to the copy points of "Fantasy Westward Journey" and other actions seriously damaged the economic system within the game, causing many players who invested in the game to suffer heavy losses, causing angry players to go to NetEase's related forums and stock bars to flood the screen with messages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to reports, the reason why "Fantasy Westward Journey" can survive to this day is closely related to its own economic system. Players can sell in-game props and equipment in some ways for cash, and it is not uncommon for some equipment to be worth hundreds of thousands or even millions of yuan. Many people make a living from games, and players also regard game props as part of their investment. However, recently, due to its own revenue pressure, NetEase has begun to "let go" of the game on a large scale under the pretext of cracking down on "studios", lowering the equipment production rate in the game and adding a large amount of direct purchase content, causing many players to suffer heavy losses, thus resulting in the scene in the article.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Students from Guilin No. 18 Middle School pointed out on the school wall that the school cafeteria had serious safety and sanitation issues. They had drunk sour and smelly green bean paste, bloody chicken, and even bugs and rubber bands in the cafeteria.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 29, Chongqing, a dispute broke out between property management staff and owners of Palm Springs International Garden Community, which then escalated into a physical conflict. One staff member hit the owner with an electric kettle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a video titled "Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Lin Jian said that China has always adhered to and developed full-process people's democracy" triggered tens of thousands of netizens to express their opinions in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 30, the Civil Aviation Flight University of China notified that only two computers (including tablets) can be left in each dormitory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of March 31, someone distributed leaflets from the Oriental Pearl TV Tower in Shanghai.
According to the content of the leaflets, a 76-year-old Chinese medicine practitioner named "Miyamoto Kai" complained that his "fumigation therapy" could not be used by the country to treat COVID-19.
The article said that he had gone to Tiananmen Square in 2020 to write to Xi Jinping asking him to "save the world" but was treated as a mental patient. In order to prevent more people from dying from the virus, they decided to throw leaflets at the Oriental Pearl TV Tower.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of March 31, a fire broke out in a factory building in Kangmeifu Railway Industrial Zone, Nan'an City, Fujian Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 30, in Yulin, Shaanxi, the Yuanchuang Jiayuan community failed to deliver the houses on schedule, and the owners gathered outside the community with banners to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 30, Tengzhou, Shandong.
The Longyang Town Government forcibly expropriated the land of Jiaozhuang Village and sent more than a dozen social figures to beat up the villagers at night. During this period, fierce conflicts broke out between the villagers and the other party, and some villagers were injured in the conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a B station UP host released a video of himself flying a drone over the Japanese Izumo frigate, which sparked heated discussion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 26, Shangrao, Jiangxi. A 17-year-old female student from Guangfeng No. 1 Middle School jumped off a building. According to media reports, the teacher saw the students whispering to each other during the exam, suspected that they were cheating and confiscated their answer sheets. That night, the student jumped from the bathroom on the 5th floor and died.
On March 31, the child's father said that his daughter was in the first year of high school in the key class of the boarding school. After the teacher confiscated her answer sheet and told her that she would be demoted and criticized by the whole class, the daughter could not bear the blow and committed suicide. The police investigation and surveillance only said that they suspected it, but there was no actual evidence. The maximum compensation they could get from communicating with the school was 450,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 28, a boat carrying line walkers capsized after departing from Mexico, killing eight Chinese on board.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of March 31, a pedestrian collision occurred on the section of the South Second Section of the First Ring Road in Chengdu from the Sichuan Provincial Military Sub-district to the Donghua Computer City. A Maybach luxury car collided with shared bicycles and electric vehicles on the non-motorized vehicle lane. From the video, it seems that the driver was suspected of driving under the influence of drugs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens who are currently tracing the route said that the Mexican state of Pachas no longer issues release papers, making the route more difficult, causing these people to take the risk and choose to traverse by water.
